channel.title: Image Re-Identification on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Image Re-Identification on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Optimal Transport-based Labor-free Text Prompt Modeling for Sketch Re-identification
item.description: Optimal Transport-based Labor-free Text Prompt Modeling (OLTM) leverages VQA and optimal transport for highly accurate sketch-based person re-identification without manual labeling.
